org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem

类 FsStateBackendFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem.FsStateBackendFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    StateBackendFactory<FsStateBackend>

    public class FsStateBackendFactory
extends Object
implements StateBackendFactory<FsStateBackend>
    A factory that creates an FsStateBackend from a configuration.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String CHECKPOINT_DIRECTORY_URI_CONF_KEY
      The key under which the config stores the directory where checkpoints should be stored
      static String MEMORY_THRESHOLD_CONF_KEY
      The key under which the config stores the threshold for state to be store in memory, rather than in files

      • createFromConfig

        public FsStateBackend createFromConfig(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
                                throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: StateBackendFactory
        Creates the state backend, optionally using the given configuration.
        指定者:
        createFromConfig 在接口中 StateBackendFactory<FsStateBackend>
        参数:
        config - The Flink configuration (loaded by the TaskManager).
        返回:
        The created state backend.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions during instantiation can be forwarded.
